alert.note: Alert for Cullman (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 8:23PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cullman County through 845 PM CDT... At 823 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Holly Pond, or 8 miles north of Blountsville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Holly Pond and Baileyton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
